main.description: An observed economic flow, which could reflect creation or a change in the quantity, location, accountability and/or responsibility, of an economic resource, whether material or not.

action.description: Defines the kind of flow, such as consume, produce, work, transfer, etc.

inputOf.description: Relates an input flow to its process.

outputOf.description: Relates an output flow to its process.

resourceInventoriedAs.description: Economic resource involved in the flow.

toResourceInventoriedAs.description: Additional economic resource on the economic event when needed by the receiver. Used when a transfer or move, or sometimes other actions, requires explicitly identifying an economic resource by the receiver, which is identified differently by the sender.

provider.description: The economic agent by whom the intended, committed, or actual economic event is initiated.

receiver.description: The economic agent whom the intended, committed, or actual economic event is for.

corrects.description: Used when an event was entered incorrectly and needs to be backed out or corrected. (The initial event cannot be changed.)

settles.description: The claim(s) settled fully or partially by the economic event.

hasBeginning.description: The planned or actual beginning date, and time if desired, of a flow or process.

hasEnd.description: The planned or actual ending date, and time if desired, of a flow or process.

hasPointInTime.description: The planned or actual date, and time if desired, of a flow; can be used instead of hasBeginning and hasEnd, if so, hasBeginning and hasEnd should be able to return this value.

resourceQuantity.description: The amount and unit of the economic resource counted or inventoried.

effortQuantity.description: The amount and unit of the work or use or citation effort-based action. This is often expressed with a time unit, but also could be cycle counts or other measures of effort or usefulness.

created.description: The date, and time if desired, the information was agreed to or recorded.

toLocation.description: The new location of the receiver resource.

image.description: The uri to an image relevant to the entity, such as a logo, avatar, photo, diagram, etc.

note.description: Any useful textual information related to the item.

fulfills.description: The commitment(s) fulfilled completely or partially by an economic event.

satisfies.description: The intent(s) satisfied fully or partially by an economic event or commitment.

resourceClassifiedAs.description: References one or more uri's for a concept in a common taxonomy or other classification scheme for purposes of categorization or grouping; or can be one or more string classifications such as tags.

resourceConformsTo.description: The lowest level resource specification or definition of an existing or potential economic resource, whether one will ever be instantiated or not.

state.description: The required state of the desired input economic resource, after coming out of a test or review process.

realizationOf.description: This non-reciprocal economic event occurs as part of this agreement.

reciprocalRealizationOf.description: This reciprocal economic event occurs as part of this agreement.
